presentation.caption: Righthand Links
presentation.hint: List of the links on the righthand side of Navbar Sub Header (excluding Join and Renew). The limit to this length list is 3, users should test how these links display in the Sub Header when the screen is resized for mobile

presentation.caption: Image Fit and Alignment
presentation.hint: Selecting this option fits the image to fill the container size while keeping it's aspect ratio. The selections adjust the image position when shrunken

presentation.caption: CTA Style (Req with CTA)
presentation.hint: This is required when a CTA is selected

presentation.caption: Text Image Layout
presentation.hint: Layout of text in relation to card image

presentation.caption: Navigation Categories
presentation.hint: The dropdown categories, subcategories and their links the navbar will have, in order

presentation.caption: Style Classes
presentation.hint: This can contain a "list" of space separated style classes.

presentation.caption: Title
presentation.hint: Used for titles/headlines. Accepts classes and some inline HTML such as line breaks, strong, underline and italicize tags, sup and sub tags and some other commonly used inline tags

presentation.caption: Text
presentation.hint:
Used for subcopy, body text and disclaimers. Automatically wraps all entered text in a paragraph (

) tag unless already wrapped. Accepts classes and some inline HTML such as line breaks, strong, underline and italicize tags, sup and sub tags and some other commonly used inline tags

presentation.caption: Mobile Image
presentation.hint: external src for mobile image

presentation.caption: Desktop Image
presentation.hint: external src for desktop image

presentation.caption: Image Alt
presentation.hint: Image Alt Attribute - Describe the image

presentation.caption: Href
presentation.hint: CT link for image if required

presentation.caption: Home Page
presentation.hint: Check this box if this link will be displayed on the Home Page

presentation.caption: Open in a new tab?
presentation.hint: Check this box if you want the link to open in a new tab

presentation.caption: Href
presentation.hint: url for the link

presentation.caption: data-gtm-position
presentation.hint:
A combination of the page, section and link number within the section. 
EX: HP Hero Slide 1

presentation.caption: data-gtm-id
presentation.hint:
A very condensed version of the data-gtm-position. A combination of the page and the overall link position on the page
EX: HP01

presentation.caption: data-gtm-name
presentation.hint: This is typically the same as data-gtm-creative

presentation.caption: data-gtm-creative
presentation.hint: This is typically the same as data-gtm-name

presentation.caption: Category
presentation.hint: name and link of the category or sub category

presentation.caption: Category
presentation.hint: Title and link for megamenu category

presentation.caption: Display on Subheader
presentation.hint: This option allows this category and it's children to be displayed on the subheader as well. This allows us to have a single source of truth for our links instead of maintaining 2 link documents

presentation.caption: Title
presentation.hint: Hint for string field

presentation.caption: Text Field
presentation.hint: Hint for text field

presentation.caption: Date Field
presentation.hint: Hint for date field

presentation.caption: Date Field
presentation.hint: Hint for date field with time

presentation.caption: Boolean Field
presentation.hint: Hint for boolean field

presentation.caption: Integer Field
presentation.hint: Hint for integer field

presentation.caption: Number Field
presentation.hint: Hint for number field

presentation.caption: Html Field
presentation.hint: Hint for html field

presentation.caption: Static dropdown Field
presentation.hint: Hint for dropdown field

presentation.caption: Radiogroup field
presentation.hint: Hint for static radiogroup field on boolean

presentation.caption: Image
presentation.hint: Hint for image link field

presentation.caption: Resource Field
presentation.hint: Hint for resource field

presentation.caption: Desktop Image
presentation.hint: Image displayed on Desktop (768px view widths and higher)

presentation.caption: Mobile Image
presentation.hint: Default image, shown below desktop view ports (below 768px)

presentation.caption: Alt Tag
presentation.hint: A description of what's shown in the image. Used by screen readers, and displayed as text when an image breaks or fails to load

presentation.caption: Title
presentation.hint: Used for titles/headlines. Accepts classes and some inline HTML such as line breaks, strong, underline and italicize tags, sup and sub tags and some other commonly used inline tags

presentation.hint:
Used for subcopy, body text and disclaimers. Automatically wraps all entered text in a paragraph (

) tag unless already wrapped. Accepts classes and some inline HTML such as line breaks, strong, underline and italicize tags, sup and sub tags and some other commonly used inline tags
